replies.msg: KNZ Technology Our production was paused for a few days due to the largest typhoon in history- ShanZhu. The whole city of Shenzhen, China was shut down, and power was cut off in factory for the past few days. We are trying to catch up now and still plan to start shipping this week. Once your order has shipped, you will receive an email with the tracking information. Shipping typically takes 7-10 business days.
